creator: matt.c.todd@gmail.com
text:
on page...
http://tomcat.apache.org/connectors-doc/generic_howto/workers.html

in the "A sample worker.properties" section the sample creates a worker connecting to locahost instead of localhost (note the missing l).  so it caused a bit of a headache trying to track down why it couldn't resolve the host.  closer inspection revealed the typo.  please fix this on the documentation site.

thanks!

creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
text: Thanks for reporting and sorry for the inconvenience. This has been fixed in r893034 and will be part of version 1.2.29.
